cr ACK d4f3fe1bb3e8d0e1d048bd1922adbc671081b249

If you retouch, could move the string as `static std::string` into `FormatFullVersion`?

```diff
diff --git a/src/clientversion.cpp b/src/clientversion.cpp
index 29c38e2d3b..8ea5aa86f8 100644
--- a/src/clientversion.cpp
+++ b/src/clientversion.cpp
@@ -40,8 +40,6 @@ const std::string CLIENT_NAME("Satoshi");
     #endif
 #endif\
> If you retouch, could move the string as static std::string into FormatFullVersion?\n\nHave taken your suggestion.
